attributes.action: strongly denounce the Chinese crackdown on Tibetan protestors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call for the Prime Minister to publicy and strongly denounce the heavy handed response of the Chinese authorities to the current protests in Tibet.  Whether one agrees with the Chinese occupation or not, PM Brown must show that the British people recognise the right of ordinary citizens to protest, and to voice their concerns.  In the lead up to the Olympics, this nation must state firmly that we denounce all attemps to silence the Tibetan people by force.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
